QuestData.Title: If the Horde Don't Get You...
QuestData.Description: <Captain Kosak coughs weakly.>$B$BWas traveling up Webwinder Path, coming from Northwatch Expedition Base Camp in the south. Ambushed. Not by Horde. Spiders. Big, ugly, hairy, nasty spiders.$B$BFought off dozens, maybe hundreds. Lost count. Overtaken by their queen. She took a chunk right out of me. Barely made it out alive. Might be dying.$B$BMore of my men coming. Must provide safe passage. Kill spider queen.$B$B<Captain Kosak passes out.>
QuestData.RewardText: <Captain Kosak forces a smile at you.>$B$BDon't worry about me. Should be ok now that big hero killed the spider queen.$B$BCan get reinforcements through safely now.
